summary: William Morrow will succeed Shiro Tsuda as president of Vodafone KK, Japan's number three mobile operator, in April . G7 finance ministers have backed plans to write off up to 100% of the debts of some of the world's poorest countries.

summary: G7 finance ministers back plans to write off up to 100% of the debts of some of the world's poorest countries .
